Patch.Name: Find Un-owned Files and Directories (Detect Only)

Vulnerability.Title: Find Un-owned Files and Directories
Vulnerability.Description:
Sometimes when administrators delete users from the password file they neglect to remove all files owned by those users from the system.
Note: This content will only provide detection of the security threat or vulnerability. Remediation must be performed manually.
